    1215             : static GF_Err gf_import_cmp(GF_MediaImporter *import, Bool mpeg12)

    3101             :         {\

    7676             : static void m2ts_create_track(GF_TSImport *tsimp, u32 mtype, u32 stype, u32 oti, u32 mpeg4_es_id, Bool is_in_iod)

    7719             : 
    7720             : /*rewrite last AVC sample currently stored in Annex-B format to ISO format (rewrite start code)*/
    7721             : void m2ts_rewrite_nalu_sample(GF_MediaImporter *import, GF_TSImport *tsimp)
    7722             : {
    7723             :         GF_Err e;
    7724             :         u32 sc_pos, start;
    7725             :         GF_BitStream *bs;
    7726             :         GF_ISOSample *samp;
    7727           0 :         u32 count = gf_isom_get_sample_count(import->dest, tsimp->track);
    7728           0 :         if (!count) return;
    7729             : 
    7730           0 :         samp = gf_isom_get_sample(import->dest, tsimp->track, count, NULL);
    7731             :         sc_pos = 1;
    7732             :         start = 0;
    7733           0 :         bs = gf_bs_new(samp->data, samp->dataLength, GF_BITSTREAM_WRITE);
    7734           0 :         while (1) {
    7735           0 :                 if (!samp->data[sc_pos] && !samp->data[sc_pos+1] && !samp->data[sc_pos+2] && (samp->data[sc_pos+3]==1)) {
    7736           0 :                         gf_bs_seek(bs, start);
    7737           0 :                         gf_bs_write_u32(bs, (u32) sc_pos-start-4);
    7738             :                         start = sc_pos;
    7739           0 :                 }
    7740           0 :                 sc_pos++;
    7741           0 :                 if (start+sc_pos>=samp->dataLength) break;
    7742             :         }
    7743           0 :         gf_bs_seek(bs, start);
    7744           0 :         gf_bs_write_u32(bs, samp->dataLength-start-4);
    7745             : 
    7746           0 :         gf_bs_del(bs);
    7747             : 
    7748           0 :         e = gf_isom_update_sample(import->dest, tsimp->track, count, samp, GF_TRUE);
    7749           0 :         if (e) {
    7750           0 :                 GF_LOG(GF_LOG_ERROR, GF_LOG_CONTAINER, ("[MPEG-2 TS Import] Error rewriting AVC NALUs: %s\n", gf_error_to_string(e) ));
    7751             :         }
    7752           0 :         gf_isom_sample_del(&samp);
    7753           0 : }
    7754             : 
    7755             : #ifndef GPAC_DISABLE_HEVC
    7756             : static void hevc_cfg_add_nalu(GF_MediaImporter *import, GF_HEVCConfig *hevccfg, u8 nal_type, char *data, u32 data_len)
    7757             : {
    7758             :         u32 i, count;

    7761             :

    7765           0 :                 if (ar->type == nal_type) break;
    7766             :                 ar = NULL;
    7767             :         }
    7768           0 :         if (!ar) {

    9218             : GF_EXPORT
    9219             : GF_Err gf_media_import_chapters_file(GF_MediaImporter *import)

    9233           0 :         if (read < 0) {

    9235           0 :                 goto err_exit;
    9236             :         }
    9237           0 :         if (read < 4) {
